summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Boston Street, from Thorndyke Avenue to 26th Avenue West; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12476 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
